original_text: We will fight them and take their things for ourselves. The people there have come back from other nations where they lived. They are living in their homes which had become heaps of stones. Now they have got many animals and valuable things. Their land has become an important place in the middle of everywhere.’
korean_text: 물건을 겁탈하며 노략하리라 하고 네 손을 들어서 황폐하였다가 지금 사람이 거주하는 땅과 여러 나라에서 모여서 짐승과 재물을 얻고 세상 중앙에 거주하는 백성을 치고자 할 때에

sentences.original_text: and take their things for ourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 것을 우리를 위해 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The people there have come back
from other nations where they lived
They are living in their homes
which had become heaps of stones
Now they have got many animals
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그들은 많은 동물들을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Their land has become an important place
